short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates an HTML file with links to all installed Chrome extensions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension Grabber - Gather and Manage Installed Extension Links
Source code: https://github.com/BenignPigeon/Extension-Grabber 

Effortlessly gather and manage the links of all the Chrome extensions you have installed on your browser with Chrome Extension Link Collector. Simplify your extension management and enhance your browsing experience.

Generate HTML File with Links: Instantly create an HTML file that contains a comprehensive list of all the installed Chrome extensions on your browser. This convenient feature allows you to easily access and share your favourite extensions with others.

Why this extension?

Efficiency and Convenience: With a single click, you can collect all your extension links and keep them organized in one place.

Sharing Made Simple: Whether you want to recommend extensions to friends, create a reference list, or keep track of the tools you rely on, Chrome Extension Link Collector enables you to effortlessly share extension links. Enhance collaboration and help others discover the best extensions for their needs.
Optimize your Chrome browsing experience by harnessing the power of Chrome Extension Link Collector. Streamline your extension management, easily gather links, and share your favourite tools with others. Download now and unlock a new level of efficiency and convenience."

If there are any issues/bugs please report them using the following link: https://github.com/BenignPigeon/Extension-Grabber/issues
